definition[0]: if a sound or a piece of music rises to a crescendo, it gradually becomes louder until it is very loud
example[0]: The shouting rose to a deafening crescendo.
example[1]: The curtains opened as the music reached a crescendo.
definition[1]: if an activity or feeling reaches a crescendo, it gradually becomes stronger until it is very strong
example[2]: The campaign reached its crescendo in the week of the election.
